SEARCH
Package jeco.core.benchmarks

Class GrammaticalEvolutionProblem

java.lang.Object
jeco.core.problem.Problem<Variable<Integer>>
jeco.core.problem.GrammaticalEvolutionAbstractProblem
jeco.core.benchmarks.GrammaticalEvolutionProblem
public class GrammaticalEvolutionProblem extends GrammaticalEvolutionAbstractProblem
This class represents a simple example for the Grammatical Evolution algorithm. The problem is to find a function that fits the given data, which is the function f(x) = x^4 + x^3 + x^2 + x The grammar is defined in the file "lib/grammar_example.bnf". The function is evaluated using the ScriptEngine class from the Java API. Note that this engine is not the most efficient way to evaluate functions.
